interpretation:
The "curly loop" emoji represents the cyclical nature of life. It signifies the ups and downs, twists and turns, and the constant ebb and flow of the universe. This card reminds us that everything is interconnected and that every action has a reaction. It is a reminder to trust the journey and embrace the unknown, as everything will eventually come full circle.

In a reading, this card may indicate that the querent is currently experiencing a cycle or phase in their life. It may also suggest that they need to trust the journey and have faith that everything will work out in the end. This card may also encourage the querent to embrace change and to be open to the unknown. Overall, the "curly loop" card reminds us that life is a journey and that we must learn to embrace the ups and downs that come with it.
